text: "Looking for a New Love" is a 1987 debut single by Jody Watley and is the leading single from her debut studio album Jody Watley. It went to number 2 in the United States, number 1 in Canada, number 13 in the United Kingdom and Australia, number 5 in New Zealand and number 3 in Greece. It was re-recorded in 2005 and was nominated for a Grammy Award in 1988. ==Track listing== Maxi- CD 2005 ==References== Category:1987 songs Category:Debut singles Category:Jody Watley songs
title: Looking for a New Love
